function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Viral particles too small for best filters","Impact":"Inadequate containment of SARS-CoV-2","Mitigation":"Implement additional ventilation precautions","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Imperfect filter systems","Impact":"Risk of increased SARS-CoV-2 spread","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and upgrades of filter systems","Technologies":"Enhanced filtration technologies","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management"},{"Description":"Unclear acknowledgment of contributors","Impact":"Lack of recognition for contributions","Mitigation":"Ensure clarity and accuracy in acknowledgments","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Authors, contributors","Owner":"Journal editorial staff"}]}
